name: Rosaria's Obelisk - Demo
description:
This is my first publicly released game and it's very important to me.

This game, or Demo, is based on my DnD campaign of the same name. I made this game to celebrate my players and our journey so far together.

I would very much appreciate any and all feedback. I plan on making this into a full-length title, so constructive criticism goes a long way!
